member.name: P:SCMM.Web.Server.Data.Models.Steam.SteamCurrency.PrefixText
member.summary: Text to appear at start of price when formatted

member.name: P:SCMM.Web.Server.Data.Models.Steam.SteamCurrency.SuffixText
member.summary: Text to appear at end of price when formatted

member.summary: Number of decimal places when formatted

member.name: P:SCMM.Web.Server.Data.Models.Steam.SteamCurrency.ExchangeRateMultiplier
member.summary: Used to convert system currency to local currency

member.name: P:SCMM.Web.Server.Data.Models.Steam.SteamCurrency.IsDefault
member.summary: If true, this is the system currency that all others are converted from

member.name: P:SCMM.Web.Server.Data.Models.Steam.SteamCurrency.IsCommon
member.summary: If true, this is a "cool" price which is highlighted when presenting "common" currencies

member.name: P:SCMM.Web.Server.Data.Models.Steam.SteamStoreItem.Prices
member.summary: Store prices are generally fixed and don't fluxuate with currency exhange rates. Because of this, we need to keep a list of all the fixed store prices in each currency.

member.name: P:SCMM.Web.Server.Data.Models.Steam.SteamStoreItemItemStore.Index

member.name: P:SCMM.Web.Server.Data.Models.Steam.SteamStoreItemItemStore.IndexGraph
